yearReplaced.description: The year when recreation associated equipment was last replaced.

language.description: Identifies the language in which the attraction information is sent.

includedInd.description: When true, this recreation is included with basic room rates.

featuredInd.description: If true, this is a featured recreation for the property.

objID.description: A unique identifier within this document for this object.

DescriptiveContentRef.description: Refers to the obj ID on an object defined elsewhere in the current document.

TimeZone.description: Describes the local time zone in which the hotel is located. This could include additional information regarding time zones (e.g., Daylight Saving Time observed), a proprietary code, the difference between the local time and GMT.

Quantity.description: The quanity of rooms that the hotel has of this type.

includedInd.description: When true, this service is included in the room rate.

availableToAnyGuestInd.description: When tre the service is available to all guests at the facility.

featuredInd.description: When true, this is a featured service for the property.

compositeInd.description: Indicates that the room type contains multiple rooms sold as a single unit.

roomGender.description: Used to request or specify a gender assignment for a room. Note: Typically used by Hosteliers.

nonsmokingInd.description: When true, this room type is non-smoking.

compositeInd.description: When true, the room (suite) is a composite of smaller units.

shareRoomInd.description: When true, the room requires or has sharing available. Note: Typically used by Hosteliers.

includedInRateInd.description: When true, this indicates that the amenity or service is included in the room rate (i.e., this service or amenity has no additional charge).

guaranteeRoomTypeViaGDSInd.description: When true, indicates that room types can be guaranteed on reservations booked through GDS channels.

guaranteeRoomTypeViaCRCInd.description: When true, indicates that room types can be guaranteed on reservations booked by central reservation centers.

guaranteeRoomTypeViaPropertyInd.description: When true, indicates that room types can be guaranteed on reservations booked by the property.

cancelPolicyInd.description: When true, indicates a cancel policy exits. When false, no cancel policy exists. Typically this indicator is used when details are not being sent.

checkInTime.description: The usual check-in time for a facility.

checkOutTime.description: The usual check-out time for the facility.

MaxChildAge.description: The maximum age for a child price.

defaultTaxServiceIncludedInd.description: When true, taxes and service charges are included, by default, with this facility's rates.

kidsStayFreeInd.description: When true, there is no charge for children.

adultsOnlyInd.description: When true, this property only accepts adult guests, children not permitted.

couplesOnlyInd.description: When true, this property only accepts couples.

taxExcludedInd.description: When present and true, this tax is excluded.

refundableDepositInd.description: When true, the pet deposit is refundable.

restrictionInd.description: When true, there is a restriction associated with this pet policy.

type.description: Used to indicate if the amount is inclusive or exclusive of other charges, such as taxes, or is cumulative (amounts have been added to each other).

taxExcludedInd.description: When true, tax is excluded from the price.

mandatoryInd.description: When true, indicates the fee is mandatory. When false, the fee is not mandatory.

taxableInd.description: When true, this fee is subject to tax.

subjectToChangeInd.description: When true, this rate type is subject to change without notice.

IdRequiredInd.description: When true, ID is required at check-in.

corporateIdInd.description: When true, a corporate ID is required to book a corporate rate.

contractLanguage.description: The language that the contract is available in.

FeatureValue.description: Value associated with the RecreationFeature enumeration.

competitorInd.description: When true, indicates this hotel is a competitor.

Marketing.description: Name of brand, marketing chain, representation company or other affiliation(s).

loadGDSInd.description: When true, this indicates rates will be loaded to specified GDSs. This attribute is also under GDS_Code to associate the rate load for an individual GDS. (This may also be used to idicate the willingness to upload rates to GDSs even if not specified in the request message.)
This attribute is used in conjunction with the GDS_Name. When true, this indicates rates will be loaded to the GDS specified by the GDS_Name.

availableInd.description: When true, room blocks are accepted.

languageRequested.description: The language in which the hotel property information should be returned.

sendDataInd.description: When true, send hotel property info data.

PolicyInfo.description: Used to indicate if policy information is being requested.

sendPoliciesInd.description: When true, policy information is being requested.

sendMeetingRoomsInd.description: When true, send meeting room information.

sendGuestRoomsInd.description: When true, send guest room information.

AreaInfo.description: Used to specifiy if area information is being requested.

sendRefPointsInd.description: When true, reference point information is being requested.

sendAttractionsInd.description: When true, attraction information is being requested.

sendRecreationsInd.description: When true, recreation information is being requested.

AffiliationInfoRequest.description: Used to indicated if affiliation information is being requested.

sendDistribSystemsInd.description: When true, distribution system information is being requested.

sendBrandInd.description: When true Brand information is being rquested.

sendLoyalProgramsInd.description: When true, loyalty program information is being requested.

sendAwardsInd.description: When true, award information is being requested.
